message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product.  Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I believe this reflects its worth, but I'm open to discussing further.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm eager to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your position, but I believe my initial offer is justified considering the unique value this product offers. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1,250,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.
